pullrequest.title: [Citadel] Reduce example names to fix build on Windows

content.raw:
most recent windows build had an internal compiler error, but it has passed with the same code, so I think we can ignore the current failure:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_cmake-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64&build=253)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_cmake-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/253/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_cmake-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/253/
